title: Honey and flaxseed loaf
ingredients: ['250ml (9 fl oz) water', '1 1/2 tablespoons flaxseed oil', '3 tablespoons honey', '1/2 tablespoon liquid lecithin', '375g (13 oz) wholemeal flour', '75g (3 oz) flax seed', '2 tablespoons strong white bread flour', '3 tablespoons whey powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons sea salt', '1 dessertspoon dried active baking yeast']
